attributes.action: Stop people panic buying in the supermarkets/shops during Coronavirus crisis.
attributes.additional_details: This panic/bilk buying is creating shortages and some people are missing out on essential items. Supermarket and other shops have empty shelves as a result of the actions of selfish individuals.
attributes.background: Bring in laws to stop people panic buying or buying in bulk from supermarkets and other shops during the Coronavirus epidemic, which has created shortages on shelves for everyone.
